TopicTitle: Linking KSP with a Mars Survival Sim?

Articles.Content:
Not sure if this has been played with yet but what about using some house rules to play two parallel games such as Surviving Mars or one of the other mars-colony games or Rimworld.  Basically link an ongoing KSP career game with deliveries of colonists and supplies for Surviving Mars...

Also has anyone tried any of the several Mars Colony games?
Reminds me of trying to put Kerbin into world's history simulator and watching the different societies develope.
